fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each day, whisper someone a message containing the Good Word. This is actually just the first whisper you send each day, and the contents of said message don't matter. They become Whaled.
- Each night, grant someone Powerful defense. Because whales. You may target yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever someone is Whaled, the first 3 whispers they send each day will spread the effect. They may spread the effect the same day they get Whaled.
- The first person to whisper you each day will also get the Whaled effect.
- You will know who is Whaled at all times.
- When all living players become Whaled, you will become (3231) Wailord, Whaleman of the Whalepocalypse *at the end of the day*. The town will be notified that "The Whale God has risen!"
- This role cannot spawn with Partisans, and no player can become a Partisan while you are alive.
- Douse Immunity

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
*You do support whales.*
Attack: Unstoppable | Defense: Invincible
Abilities:
- Flop on someone's house, killing them and all visitors. You can kill Astral visitors this way.
Attributes:
- Roleblock, Control, Redirect, Frame, Mute, Rolestop and Conversion Immunity.
- Flopping is Astral.
- It is constantly raining outside, and people don't want to go out much. They cannot visit more than four houses away from them. You are immune to this.
- Anyone who visits you or you directly kill will drown, dying and appearing as Drowned in the graveyard (role/will cleaned). Drowned players cannot be targeted by any living players.
- You can drown Astral visitors to you.
- You cannot be modkilled.
- If you are Jailed, you will attack the Jailor and all of their visitors. The Jailor will be Drowned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
